name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AMZ Cart Share: Share your Amazon cart in 1 click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share links to all the items in your Amazon cart with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly share your Amazon cart!
AMZ Cart Share is the easiest way to share your Amazon cart with someone.

Just install this extension, then visit your Amazon cart page and click our extension to generate your sharable cart link. 
Anyone that clicks your link can add all your Amazon items to their own cart.

Join over 9k+ people using AMZ Cart Share to share their Amazon cart items with their friends, family and co-workers.

------

How It Works:

‚¨áÔ∏è Install the Chrome extension: Begin by installing the AMZ Cart Share Chrome extension. Our lightweight extension integrates with Amazon, letting you quickly share the items in your Amazon cart.

üîó Generate Your Cart Link: Navigate to your Amazon cart and click the AMZ Cart Share extension icon. With just one click, you can generate a unique link that captures all the items in your cart, including the specific quantities.

üõí Share your link: Share your generated link with anyone. When they click on your link, they're taken to Amazon with an option to add all the items from your cart into theirs in one fell swoop. It's that easy!

------

FAQ:

Q: How do I share my Amazon cart?
A: To share your Amazon cart with AMZ Cart Share, start by installing our Chrome extension. Then visit your Amazon cart page, open our extension, and use it to generate a new cart link. Send your link to someone, and they can use it to add those items to their own Amazon cart.

Q: Can I send my Amazon cart to someone?
A: Yes, you can send your Amazon cart items to someone by using our extension, AMZ Cart Share. Once you've created and shared an Amazon cart link, anybody can click it to view the items and add them directly to their cart.

Q: Does my Amazon cart link stay updated?
A: No, links to your Amazon cart generated with AMZ Cart Share don't stay updated. If you change the items in your cart, you should use our extension to create a new cart link. Our Chrome extension creates a link for all the items in your cart at the current moment, and unfortunately it's impossible for us to update it.

---

Install our Chrome Extension and start sharing your Amazon shopping carts with ease. It's free, easy to use, and takes 1 minute to get started.

Note: Some links generated via the AMZ Cart Share Chrome extension may include a parameter of affiliation.
